description: Complete Japanese Learning System - Flashcards, Kanji, Grammar, Practice, Reading, and Games for N5-N1

changes: Added comprehensive Kanji section for all levels
N5: 30 essential kanji characters (based on StudyKanji.net JLPT list)
N4-N1: 10 kanji per level (sample set)
Each kanji includes: character, meaning, on/kun readings, stroke count, examples
Kanji data supports SRS (Spaced Repetition System)
Users can now review kanji separately from vocabulary
Added interactive game mechanics for all levels
N5: Hiragana Matching, Speed Quiz, Particle Practice, Memory Cards
N4: Sentence Builder, Kanji Reading Quiz
N3: Speed Reading Challenge
N2: Keigo & Formal Expression Quiz
N1: Literary Analysis Game
Games include time limits, scoring, and progressive difficulty
Original content - not copied from any source
Added original reading comprehension passages (5 per level)
Reading passages progress from basic to advanced topics
Comprehension questions test understanding and critical thinking
Total practice questions: 65 per level (60 + 5 reading comp)
Added complete grammar sections (20-25 patterns per level)
Added comprehensive practice questions (60 per level)
Grammar patterns based on Tofugu and standard JLPT curriculum
Practice includes vocabulary, grammar, and reading comprehension
All levels now feature complete learning data
Added test flashcard for update verification
Updated vocabulary items
Initial release
100 N5 vocabulary items
100 N4 vocabulary items
100 N3 vocabulary items
100 N2 vocabulary items
100 N1 vocabulary items
